_header: Think on him and have good mind
_description: A couplet in the story of Emperor Fredericus in the Gesta Romanorum

BLHar5369.Transcription: þynke on hym and haue gode myndeþat tho þe wos so kynde
BLHar5369.Note: Added to lower margin by a later hand.

BLAdd45557.Transcription:
Thenke on hym & haue mindeþat to þe was so
                    kynde
